text:
Hi i've got a question: <@U06GS7BG27J> <@U07ARLLF39N>

Given that HubSpot doesn't provide an SDK for web-based apps, we're exploring alternative solutions for our app clips and instant apps. Would it be feasible to redirect users from these web-based versions to our main website's support page, where we could integrate the HubSpot chat function? This would allow us to maintain chat support capabilities for users of our web-based app versions.
